settings.question: 1. What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
• We have a flexible return policy that allows you to return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange, provided it is in its original condition.
  • If you wish to return an item, simply contact our customer service team and they will guide you through the process.

settings.question: 2. How can I track my order?
settings.answer:
• Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with your tracking information.
  • Use this code on the corresponding transporter's website to see your order status.
  • If you have any questions about the status of your order, feel free to contact our customer service team.

settings.question: 3. Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer:
• Yes, we offer free shipping on all orders over $100 within Canada, and certain specific discounted items.
  • We do not currently ship internationally. If you have any questions about shipping, please contact our customer service team.

settings.question: 4. What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer:
• We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, bank transfers, and cash on delivery.
  • If you have a special agreement, want to pay by bank transfer, or cash-on-delivery, fill this form to get in touch with us.
